definitions.text: a defense of some offensive behavior or some failure to keep a promise etc.
examples: he kept finding excuses to stay
every day he had a new alibi for not getting a job
he had to get his mother to write an excuse for him
it was an apology for a meal
a poor excuse for an automobile
Please excuse me from this class

definitions.text: serve as a reason or cause or justification of
examples: Your need to sleep late does not excuse your late arrival at work
Her recent divorce may explain her reluctance to date again

definitions.text: defend, explain, clear away, or make excuses for by reasoning
examples: rationalize the child's seemingly crazy behavior
he rationalized his lack of success

definitions.text: ask for permission to be released from an engagement
excuse, overlook, or make allowances for; be lenient with
examples: She condoned her husband's occasional infidelities
